attributes.action: write legislation that bans the use of any patriotic imagery in political campaigns.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Because of the actions of parties such as the BNP and others, British patriotic imagery has become associated with racial intolerance and violence. This petition seeks to ban all use of the flags of Britain and/or images of its armed forces or famous Britons from history to promote the agendas of individual political parties. Such imagery should be unnecessary in any case as all political parties exist to benefit the people of Britain.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
